meta.desc: Control your media players in the panel.
meta.desc_long:
Control your media players in the panel.

- Display information of the current track in the panel
- Can perform different actions with the mouse.
- Has basic controls such as play/pause, next track, previous track and other controls such as loop and shuffle.
- Blacklist media players
- and highly configurable...
